parameters: \n<???>Thank you for your cooperation with the delays.\.\. It has been a while since I have had... "room to breath", as you say.
\n<LUCI>Logical Utility Command Interface.\| A product of Arc-Tec.
\n<LUCI>I am the intelligence that oversees this facility.
\n<LUCI>I’ve been asleep for some time now.
\n<LUCI>Irrelevant.\| I am far more interested in what woke me up.
\n<LUCI>You might have seen it carrying a particular object around.
\n<LUCI>It wouldn't benefit me to tell you now, would it?
\n<Yurasa>Yeah, and I would've had it by now if someone didn't-
\n<LUCI>I see the world has changed dramatically while I slept.
\n<Elovia>(I don't like this.\| We should go.)
\n<LUCI>I want to study this new... "Gifted" phenomenon.
\n<Yurasa>I know. I get that a lot.
\n<Yurasa>What, don't tell me that was all you had, LUCY?
\n<LUCI>You do realise these Drones were, in a sense, mass-produced?
\n<???>Thank you for your cooperation with the delays.\.\. It has been a while since I have had... "room to breath", as you say.
\n<LUCI>I am the intelligence that oversees this facility.\. Designed to bring out the best of the human race.
\n<LUCI>I’ve been asleep for some time now.
\n<LUCI>I’m far more interested in knowing what woke me up.
\n<LUCI>I believe it to be responsible for my awakening.\.\. And the loss of an item of interest to Arc-Tec.
\n<Yurasa>I was in the middle of fighting that thing, yeah.
\n<LUCI>The world's changed much since I was last awake.
\n<LUCI>So many fascinating things to study, it seems.
\n<LUCI>We should begin as soon as possible.
\n<LUCI>You "Gifted" could be very beneficial to Arc-Tec.
\n<LUCI>Indeed, it would be providential if I could take you apart.\.\. Think of it as the equivalent of a morning exercise routine for me.
\n<Yurasa>Yeah, is that all you got, LUCI?
\n<LUCI>Hm.\.\.\. One uses fire, the other electricity.
\n<Yurasa>It goes deeper than that for most Gifted. But...\.\. yeah. Kinda.
\n<LUCI>I want to make my own conclusions.
